channel.title: PLEASE! help me
channel.description:
hello i have downloaded this server here, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200796.0.html and you need like 45 defence to wield a rune c'bow on it, how can i make it so u need 1 defence on it?
also dark bow/rune c'bow dont say rapid/accurate/longrange, it says the stuff a weapon says, can anyone please help me with this.

i didit already ftw

item.title: PLEASE! help me
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

FOllow this:

Darkbow/Rune crossbow does say Rapid/ accurate/longrange:

Open up client.java and search:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) { PkingDelay = 15; wepdelay = 15; UseBow = true; }

Press enter at the last } and add:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785)
{
PkingDelay = 15;
 wepdelay = 15;
 UseBow = true;
}

Keep doing thats same for Rune c’bow

and when you see this :

if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859
Just add item id of Dark bow and Rune c’bow to it

There are alot more

Dark bow id = 11785
Rune c’bow = 10431

I hope it helped you.

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE! help me
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

Open client.java

Do ctrl + F and type there in “public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {” ( without " )

Then you’ll see if (ItemID == 10431) { return 45; }
If not Press enter at the last { of Public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

and add it there, Then change Return 45; to return 1;

close & compile Done. Post errors again

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE! help me
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

ok first off all

Open client.java search public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

Then u’ll see something like this:

if (ItemID == 10431) { return 45;

Where 45 stands make it to 1 so you need 1 def to use it

Darkbow/Rune crossbow doesn’t say Rapid/ accurate/longrange:

Open up client.java and search:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) { PkingDelay = 15; wepdelay = 15; UseBow = true; }

Press enter at the last } and add:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785)
{
PkingDelay = 15;
 wepdelay = 15;
 UseBow = true;
}

Keep doing thats same for Rune c’bow

and when you see this :

if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859
Just add item id of Dark bow and Rune c’bow to it

There are alot more

Dark bow id = 11785
Rune c’bow = 10431

I hope it helped you.

Read full topic
